name: Steadyrack Fat Bike Rack
description: Because N+1 is the right number of bikes, this rack swivels 180 degrees to save space and to fold out of the way when not needed. Store your hardtail, your commuter bike, your road machine, your fat bike, your downhill ride, and so on, and so on.Compatible with tires between 2.4 and 5 inches.Fits bikes without fenders.Folds at 180-degrees when not in use.Requires 35cm between racks to load and unload.Rack design makes it possible to lock your bike to it.Dimensions are 12 x 12 x 85.5cm.
